meanings.definition: A group of people who share a common interest or purpose.
meanings.sent1: At school, the socs formed a club to clean up the playground together.
meanings.sent2: The socs in the neighborhood organized a charity event to help those in need.
meanings.sent3: During the picnic, the socs had a fun time playing games and chatting.
meanings.sent4: The socs worked like a well-oiled machine to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent5: The socs were like a close-knit family, always supporting each other.

meanings.definition: A type of footwear typically worn indoors.
meanings.sent1: She slipped on her comfy socs before relaxing on the couch.
meanings.sent2: In winter, many people prefer to wear warm socs around the house.
meanings.sent3: His socs were so cozy that he didn't want to take them off.
meanings.sent4: The fluffy socs felt like walking on clouds with each step.
meanings.sent5: Her colorful socs added a cheerful touch to her outfit.

meanings.definition: To engage in social activities or events.
meanings.sent1: They decided to socs together by attending the community dance.
meanings.sent2: Every Friday night, they socs by going out for dinner and a movie.
meanings.sent3: The friends planned to socs at the park by having a picnic.
meanings.sent4: She loves to socs with new people and make friends wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The group will socs at the beach for a day of sun, sand, and fun.
